intro_0.value: Jaysus!... it must have been a fierce one last night

intro_1.value: I hope Ma and Da are alright.

intro_3.value: No answer... I better take a look around.

cant_leave.value: I can't leave now! I have to find Ma and Da.

the_head_0.value: I've heard of getting legless, but this is on another level!

the_head_2.value: Jaysus! don't sneak up on a girl like that

the_head_3.value: You look like a bit of a piss head, have you seen my Ma and Da? They work here

what_the.value: What's going on? why is this floating..

demon_eye_0.value: Ah there's a card piece... Jaysus, Mary, Mother of God! What in the blue fuck is that thing!?

demon_eye_5.value: Rat boy... I hardly knew ye..

demon_eye_6.value: I guess I'll need something to hide in to get that card piece.

demon_eye_7.value: Good thing I'm already in this box!

the_servant_0.value: [shake rate=50]Uggh.[/shake], Feels like someone just walked over my grave. Wait.. why is it getting hot in here!

the_servant_7.value: Alright I'll get that bottle for ya but first. Can you tell me what's going on here?

the_servant_14.value: Jaysus, what have I gotten myself into... I hope you're not lying to me and you can help. I'll be back with the bottle soon

the_servant_has_brandy.value: Here ya go, I hope you'll enjoy it

the_servant_no_brandy.value: Sorry I haven't found it yet

the_devil_4.value: I'm here to get my Ma and Da back, where are they? What have you done with them?

the_devil_8.value: Well, I don't have much of a choice in the matter. I'm in, the cards will be Ace, Ace, Ten!

the_good_end_1.value: You're not Parsons.. Who are you?

boss_battle_1.value: Come and fight me like a man

boss_battle_won.value: Alright Parsons this card is mine now, slip it into the deck and give it to your master

victory_message.value: Right, now to get Ma and Da...

the_head_4.value: I have no time for entertaining you child, your Ma and Da are probably dead like the rest.

card_expo.value: Now, step away from the head. I must retrieve my masters card

marked_0.value: You do not know what you are dealing with. You have been marked child, I will know of your precence within these walls.

marked_2.value: Do not test my patience young one, lest you wish to learn the fate of those who stood in our way!

boss_battle_2.value: You petulant child! This is your final warning, give me the card pieces and leave

boss_battle_3.value: Don't think just because you have some palor trick magic you can beat me

the_servant_1.value: HEEEELP ME, I'm burnin' up.... HEEEELP

the_servant_3.value: Sure if you hadn't noticed. I'm already brown bread

the_servant_4.value: Listen, I've been keeping an eye on ya, I see you've been collectin' the card pieces

the_servant_5.value: Well, I know of a way I can help you but I need a favour I'm parched and would murder some Brandy

the_servant_6.value: If you can get that bottle for me, I'll help you out with Lord Parsons' the fella running around in his dressing gown if you didn't know already

the_servant_12.value: Himself and his master are planning on opening up a hell mouth to unleash the infernal denizens upon the earth, We have one resident demon already!

the_servant_13.value: Now if you're thinkin' what's all this shite about card pieces. Well that's an interestin' one. Ya see the master fella has a special card he can turn any hand into a winner by using it.

the_servant_14.value: Now how will that help me ya say. If you can get all of them and repeat the incantation

the_servant_18.value: Then POOF! they'll all pop together and you'll be the master of the card.

the_servant_19.value: Now a bit of good news. Your Ma and Da are alive but held captive by Parsons' master. If you can get control of this card you can challenge him to a game for their freedom

the_servant_20.value: Look, I'll fill you in more when you get the Brandy, so can you hurry up? I know I'm dead but I don't have all night..

the_servant_ask_for_brandy.value: So chick. Do you have that brandy?

the_servant_has_brandy.value: Ah lovely! you have it. Hold on, let me swig it down...

the_servant_power_0.value: Thanks for that chick. Now if you're wondering how I can help you. The answer is....... MAGIC!

the_servant_power_1.value: I'm going to fuse my spirit with this...... Spirit, and when you give it a little splash it'll send out a blast of positive energy to counter act Parsons' negative

the_servant_power_2.value: Now hang on there and let me do this ritual... I hope these books I've been reading aren't all bollocks!

the_servant_power_3.value: Now chick, just pick up the bottle and you'll have a fighting chance with Parsons... Let's go before it's too late

boss_battle_won.value: You done it chic. I'm afriad I'll have to leave ya now..

boss_battle_won_1.value: Thanks for setting my spirit free from this cursed place, now slip him the caaaarrr...

the_devil_2.value: Parsons' get in here and bring me my cards!

the_devil_3.value: Well, little one. What is it that brought you here?

the_devil_4.value: Ahhh, here to save the day what a brave little girl. How about we play a little game of cards first

the_devil_5.value: We're going to play 3 card blackjack. I'll draw three cards and you bet on what they'll be.

the_devil_6.value: Guess correct and you win, it's all very simple...

the_devil_7.value: So do we have a deal?

the_devil_bad_end.value: Ohh too bad little one, I guess Ma and Da won't be saved after all. Parsons' you know what to do..

the_devil_good_end.value: Argh, You sneaky little witch, used my servant and card against me.

good_end.value: Well, I guess a deal is a deal....

good_end_1.value: Say hello to Ma and Da for me...

the_end.value: Who I am matters not. But you! little one, have made a grave mistake.

the_end_1.value: Only a fool would make a bargin with the devil and now I welcome you to Hell...

the_end_2.value: I shall be your guide through this realm and I will help you find your Ma and Da. Come now, we must make haste
